reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress classy for holidays and well-made, appreciating its thick material and dark red color. They describe it as comfortable, warm on chilly days, and flattering, with one customer noting how the belt accentuates the waist beautifully. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it nice while others say it's not flattering. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy dress for any occasion
items.body: When I ordered the dress, I was concerned it would be too short. But the length came just about 3 inches above my knee, so it's still classy for the Holidays. The material is very thick, so it is warm. You can tie the bow in front or in the back to make the dress fit a little tighter, which I appreciated. The color was gorgeous, a hunter/kelly green. Can wear anytime. I would be another one, but I have way too many clothes. I needed it for a holiday party and chose green instead of my typical red. But I am a fan. I bought a medium. I usually wear a size 8 in dresses. Fit fine, not too snug or too big, just right. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Stylish, and Perfect for Fall/Winter!
items.body: I absolutely love this HOTOUCH dress! Itâ€™s soft, comfortable, and warm enough for cooler fall and winter days without feeling bulky. The crewneck and long sleeves give it a classic, cozy vibe, and the fit is really flattering â€” not too tight, not too loose. It pairs perfectly with boots and a scarf for an easy, stylish look. The material has a nice stretch and holds up well after washing, too. Iâ€™ve already gotten compliments every time Iâ€™ve worn it! Definitely a great addition to your cold-weather wardrobe â€” Iâ€™m thinking of grabbing it in another color! Read more
items.author: Avi

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Do NOT size down- size up!
items.body: This is really cute on. However, Amazon recommended a size smaller than I usually get and that was a mistake- definitely order your size or size up one. I havenâ€™t even washed it yet and itâ€™s small on me. These sleeves are short- fits me more like 3/4 length sleeves, so I have to push them up and wear a jacket if going outside. The material is thick but not soft- itâ€™s a bit rigid. The belt lands just under your bra line like an empire waist, which I wasnâ€™t expecting. The length is good- hits mid thigh. Overall, itâ€™s cute, but I wish I had gone with a larger size. Read more
items.author: Ana Pendergrass

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality, very pretty. Small, dark red color.
items.body: Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€ and weigh 112. I ordered the small and it fits very well. The fabric is medium weight and the fit of the dress is very flattering. It looks just like the picture. The belt is also well made and ties nicely to complement the dress. Itâ€™s so cute on. Read more
items.author: Daniel Bluck

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Comfortable, and Flattering!
items.body: The HOTOUCH Womenâ€™s Ribbed Knit Sweater Dress is everything I wanted in a sweater dress! The dark red color is rich and vibrant, perfect for any occasion. The ribbed knit fabric is soft, stretchy, and feels great against the skin while keeping me warm on cooler days. The fit is absolutely flatteringâ€”the belt accentuates the waist beautifully, and the dress hugs in all the right places without being too tight. The length is just right for a classy yet chic look, and the long sleeves add to the overall elegance. Whether dressed up with heels or styled casually with boots, this sweater dress is versatile and perfect for work, a date night, or any event. Highly recommend it for anyone looking for a stylish and comfortable outfit! Read more
items.author: Ashley Dugan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not quality
items.body: This dress is cursed for me. The first one I ordered had a slash through the packaging and managed to snag the dress. But there was a replacement sent within a few days, so that was great. When I finally got to wear it, I noticed these couple of spots where the threading is a completely different color. Not really noticeable unless you look closely, but not quality. The belt loops are flimsy. The fabric and color are nice, I got a lot of compliments and it keeps you warm. The length is good (above the knees), and with the chilly weather it goes well with boots. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Great quality fits perfect and accentuate to the waist. Good for curves! Read more
items.author: Jackie C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it for winter
items.body: Durable and comfortable. Withstood 40 degree weather easily. Pretty cute too. I wore it with winter stockings and heels outdoors for a 45 min speech under a tint. Read more
items.author: Liliac

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Rust, White, Deep Red, Striped Apricot Black, Apricot, Dark Blue, Black, Green, Dark Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
